title: Drama at the Dog Park
description: Katie and the Union discuss Simone Biles withdrawing from the team and individual all-around competitions at the Olympics, and the subsequent reaction. Plus: the next Olympic sport, things you’d put on easy mode, and can you do a cartwheel.
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie and the Union chat about Simone Biles
itunes:summary: Katie and the Union discuss Simone Biles withdrawing from the team and individual all-around competitions at the Olympics, and the subsequent reaction. Plus: the next Olympic sport, things you’d put on easy mode, and can you do a cartwheel.
